message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's only fair to present my opening offer at $750,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'd be willing to purchase it for $700,000. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, but I must maintain the value of our product. I am unable to accept $700,000. My counteroffer is $725,000.
